titleInfo.title: 'Camel Guard-of-Honour, Koweit.' Photographer: Raja Deen Dayal & Sons

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:141 x 202 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling.Foliation:‘20’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView of a group of eleven men mounted on camels to form a guard of honour.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'Camel Guard-of-Honour, Koweit.'Pencil, lower right, alongside image: ‘20’
